events.title: First Powered Flight
events.description: Wright brothers achieve first powered, sustained flight at Kitty Hawk

events.title: First Tour de France
events.description: The first Tour de France cycling race is held

events.title: Ford Motor Company
events.description: Henry Ford establishes the Ford Motor Company

events.title: First Western Movie
events.description: 'The Great Train Robbery' premieres, pioneering the Western genre

events.title: First World Series
events.description: First modern World Series baseball championship is played

events.title: World War I Begins
events.description: The assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand triggers World War I

events.title: Panama Canal Opens
events.description: The Panama Canal officially opens to maritime traffic

events.title: ANZAC Forces Formed
events.description: Australian and New Zealand Army Corps established

events.title: Federal Reserve Opens
events.description: US Federal Reserve Bank begins operations

events.title: Charlie Chaplin Debut
events.description: Charlie Chaplin makes his film debut in 'Making a Living'

events.title: Penicillin Discovery
events.description: Alexander Fleming discovers penicillin, revolutionizing medicine

events.title: Mickey Mouse Debut
events.description: Walt Disney's Mickey Mouse makes first appearance

events.title: World War II Ends
events.description: Japan surrenders, marking the end of World War II

events.title: United Nations Founded
events.description: The UN is established to maintain international peace

events.title: Moon Landing
events.description: Apollo 11 astronauts become first humans to walk on the moon

events.title: Woodstock Festival
events.description: Historic music festival draws over 400,000 people

events.title: Fall of Berlin Wall
events.description: The Berlin Wall falls, symbolizing the end of the Cold War

events.title: World Wide Web Invented
events.description: Tim Berners-Lee invents the World Wide Web

events.title: Dolly the Sheep
events.description: First successful cloning of a mammal

events.title: Olympics in Atlanta
events.description: Centennial Olympic Games held in Atlanta, USA

events.title: Global Financial Crisis
events.description: Worldwide financial crisis begins with Lehman Brothers collapse

events.title: Large Hadron Collider
events.description: World's largest particle collider begins operations

events.title: Paris Climate Agreement
events.description: 196 countries sign landmark climate change agreement

events.title: New Horizons Reaches Pluto
events.description: First spacecraft to reach Pluto sends detailed images

events.title: COVID-19 Pandemic
events.description: WHO declares COVID-19 a global pandemic

events.title: Global Lockdowns
events.description: Countries worldwide implement lockdown measures

events.title: Vaccine Development
events.description: First COVID-19 vaccines receive emergency approval

events.title: Tokyo Olympics Postponed
events.description: 2020 Summer Olympics postponed due to COVID-19 pandemic

events.title: SpaceX Crew Dragon Launch
events.description: First commercial spacecraft to carry humans to the ISS

events.title: Australian Bushfires Peak
events.description: Devastating bushfires in Australia reach their peak

events.title: US Presidential Election
events.description: Joe Biden elected as 46th US President
